Package be.helha.api_recettapp.services

Class IngredientServiceDB

java.lang.Object
be.helha.api_recettapp.services.IngredientServiceDB
All Implemented Interfaces:
IIngredientService
@Service @Primary public class IngredientServiceDB extends Object implements IIngredientService
Service class for managing Ingredient entities, providing CRUD operations and database interactions.
